title: Megan Thee Stallion: "Body" / "Savage" | 2021 GRAMMY Awards Show Performance
author: Recording Academy / GRAMMYs
description:
Watch Megan Thee Stallion's performance of "Body" / "Savage"

https://www.grammy.com/grammys/news/2021-grammys-complete-winners-nominees-list

About the Recording Academy / GRAMMYs: 
Recording Academy is the world's leading society of musical professionals and is dedicated to celebrating, honoring, and sustaining music's past, present and future.

关于录音学院/格莱美奖。
录音学院是全球领先的音乐专业人士协会，致力于庆祝、表彰和支持音乐的过去、现在和未来。

与美国录音学院/格莱美奖联系。
